column1: The ISL1557A is a dual operational amplifier designed for VDSL2 and ADSL line driving in DMT-based solutions, offering up to 750mA drive capability while consuming only 6mA of supply current per amplifier. It can operate from a 4.5V to 12V supply and includes robust output clamps for enhanced lightning transient protection. The device is well suited for ADSL2+, SDSL, HDSL2, and VDSL line driving applications.
